00016   type :: source_type
00017 
00018     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! energy range for fission source
00019     real(8)              :: cdf_width ! width of cdf bins from 0 to 1
00020 
00021   end type source_type
00022 
00023   type :: thermal_type
00024 
00025     integer               :: kTsize    ! size of kT vector
00026     integer               :: cdfsize   ! size of cdf
00027     real(8), allocatable  :: kTvec(:)  ! vector of kT values
00028     real(8), allocatable  :: Erat(:,:) ! energy
00029     real(8)               :: cdf_width ! width of cdf interval from 0 to 1 
00030     
00031   end type thermal_type
00032 
00033   type :: iso_type
00034 
00035     real(8)               :: N           ! number density
00036     real(8)               :: A           ! atomic weight
00037     real(8)               :: alpha       ! (A-1)^2/(A+1)^2
00038     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_capt(:)  ! capture micro xs
00039     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_scat(:)  ! scattering micro xs
00040 
00041     logical               :: thermal     ! thermal scatterer
00042     type(thermal_type)    :: thermal_lib ! thermal library
00043 
00044   end type iso_type
00045 
00046   type, public ::  material_type
00047 
00048     type(source_type)           :: source        ! the source of neutrons
00049     type(iso_type), allocatable :: isotopes(:)   ! 1-D array of isotopes in mat
00050     integer                     :: nisotopes     ! number of isotopes in mat
00051     integer                     :: curr_iso      ! the current isotope
00052     integer                     :: npts          ! number of points in energy
00053     real(8)                     :: E_width       ! width of energy interval
00054     real(8)                     :: E_min         ! min energy
00055     real(8)                     :: E_max         ! max energy
00056     real(8), allocatable        :: totalxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic tot xs
00057     real(8), allocatable        :: scattxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic scat xs
00058     real(8), allocatable        :: absorxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic abs xs
00059 
00060   end type material_type

00064 !===============================================================================
00065 ! SET_UP_MATERIALS
00068 
00069   subroutine setup_material(this,emin,emax)
00070 
00071     ! formal variables
00072     type(material_type) :: this      ! a material
00073     real(8)             :: emin      ! minimum energy to consider
00074     real(8)             :: emax      ! maximum energy to consider
00075 
00076     ! allocate isotopes array
00077     if (.not. allocated(this%isotopes)) allocate(this%isotopes(this%nisotopes))
00078 
00079     ! set up current isotope index
00080     this%curr_iso = 1
00081 
00082     ! set energy bounds
00083     this%E_min = emin
00084     this%E_max = emax
00085 
00086   end subroutine setup_material

00088 !===============================================================================
00089 ! LOAD_ISOTOPE
00092 
00093   subroutine load_isotope(this,N,A,path,thermal)
00094 
00095     use hdf5
00096 
00097     ! formal variables
00098     type(material_type),target :: this    ! a material
00099     real(8)                    :: N       ! number density
00100     real(8)                    :: A       ! atomic weight
00101     character(len=255)         :: path    ! path to isotope
00102     logical                    :: thermal ! contains a thermal lib
00103 
00104     ! local variables
00105     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00106     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00107     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00108     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00109     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(2) :: dim2         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00110     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size
00111     type(thermal_type), pointer    :: therm
00112 
00113     ! display to user
00114     write(*,*) 'Loading isotope:',this%curr_iso
00115 
00116     ! set parameters
00117     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%N = N
00118     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%A = A
00119     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%alpha = ((A-1)/(A+1))**2 
00120     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal = thermal
00121 
00122     ! open up hdf5 file
00123     call h5fopen_f(trim(path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00124 
00125     ! read size of vector
00126     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00127     dim1 = (/1/)
00128     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00129     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00130 
00131     ! allocate all xs vectors
00132     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat))                  &
00133    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat(vecsize))
00134     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt))                  &
00135    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt(vecsize))
00136 
00137     ! keep the size
00138     this%npts = vecsize
00139 
00140     ! zero out xs vectors
00141     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat = 0.0_8
00142     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt = 0.0_8
00143 
00144     ! read in xs
00145     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_scat",dataset_id,error)
00146     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00147     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00148    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat,dim1,error)
00149     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00150     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_capt",dataset_id,error)
00151     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00152     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00153    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt,dim1,error)
00154     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00155 
00156     ! get energy interval width
00157     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E_width",dataset_id,error)
00158     dim1 = (/1/)
00159     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%E_width,dim1,error)
00160     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00161 
00162     ! check for thermal scattering kernel and load that
00163     if (this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal) then
00164 
00165       ! set pointer
00166       therm => this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal_lib
00167 
00168       ! load sizes
00169       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kTsize",dataset_id,error)
00170       dim1 = (/1/)
00171       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%kTsize,dim1,error)
00172       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00173       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdfsize",dataset_id,error)
00174       dim1 = (/1/)
00175       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%cdfsize,dim1,error)
00176       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00177 
00178       ! read in cdf width
00179       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00180       dim1 = (/1/)
00181       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%cdf_width,dim1,error)
00182       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00183 
00184       ! preallocate vectors
00185       if(.not.allocated(therm%kTvec)) allocate(therm%kTvec(therm%kTsize))
00186       if(.not.allocated(therm%Erat)) allocate(therm%Erat(therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize))
00187 
00188       ! read in vectors
00189       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kT",dataset_id,error)
00190       dim1 = (/therm%kTsize/)
00191       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%kTvec,dim1,error)
00192       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00193       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/Erat",dataset_id,error)
00194       dim2 = (/therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize/)
00195       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%Erat,dim2,error)
00196       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00197 
00198     end if
00199 
00200     ! close hdf5 file
00201     call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00202 
00203     ! increment isotope counter
00204     this%curr_iso = this%curr_iso + 1
00205 
00206   end subroutine load_isotope
00207 
00208 !===============================================================================
00209 ! LOAD_SOURCE
00212 
00213   subroutine load_source(this,source_type,source_path)
00214 
00215     use hdf5 
00216 
00217     ! formal variables
00218     type(material_type) :: this        ! a material
00219     integer             :: source_type ! 0 - fixed, 1 - fission
00220     character(len=255)  :: source_path ! path to source file
00221 
00222     ! local variables
00223     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00224     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00225     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00226     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00227     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size for fission
00228 
00229 
00230     ! check for fission source
00231     if (source_type == 1) then
00232 
00233       ! open the fission source file
00234       call h5fopen_f(trim(source_path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00235 
00236       ! open dataset and read in vector size
00237       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00238       dim1 = (/1/)
00239       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00240       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00241 
00242       ! open dataset and read in width of cdf interval
00243       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00244       dim1 = (/1/)
00245       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%cdf_width,dim1,  &
00246      &               error)
00247       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00248 
00249       ! preallocate vectors in source object
00250       if(.not.allocated(this%source%E)) allocate(this%source%E(vecsize))
00251 
00252       ! open dataset and read in energy vector
00253       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E",dataset_id,error)
00254       dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00255       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%E,dim1,error)
00256       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00257 
00258       ! close the file
00259       call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00260 
00261     end if
00262 
00263   end subroutine load_source
00264 
00265 !===============================================================================
00266 ! COMPUTE_MACROXS
00269 
00270   subroutine compute_macroxs(this)
00271 
00272     ! formal variables
00273     type(material_type),target :: this ! a material
00274 
00275     ! local variables
00276     integer                 :: i   ! loop counter
00277     type(iso_type), pointer :: iso ! pointer to current isotope
00278 
00279     ! allocate xs arrays
00280     if (.not.allocated(this%totalxs))                                          &
00281    &                            allocate(this%totalxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00282     if (.not.allocated(this%scattxs))                                          &
00283    &                            allocate(this%scattxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00284     if (.not.allocated(this%absorxs))                                          &
00285    &                            allocate(this%absorxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00286 
00287     ! zero out total xs
00288     this%totalxs = 0.0_8
00289 
00290     ! begin loop over isotopes
00291     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00292 
00293       ! set pointer to isotope
00294       iso => this%isotopes(i)
00295 
00296       ! multiply microscopic cross section by number density and append
00297       this%scattxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_scat)
00298       this%absorxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt)
00299       this%totalxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt + iso%xs_scat)
00300 
00301     end do
00302 
00303   end subroutine compute_macroxs
00304 
00305 !===============================================================================
00306 ! DEALLOCATE_MATERIAL
00309 
00310   subroutine deallocate_material(this)
00311 
00312     ! formal variables
00313     type(material_type) :: this ! a material
00314 
00315     ! local variables
00316     integer :: i ! loop counter
00317 
00318     ! deallocate source information
00319     if (allocated(this%source%E)) deallocate(this%source%E)
00320 
00321     ! begin loop over isotopes for deallocation
00322     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00323 
00324       ! deallocate thermal library
00325       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%kTvec)) deallocate            &
00326      &             (this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%kTvec)
00327       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%Erat)) deallocate             &
00328      &             (this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%Erat)
00329 
00330       ! deallocate xs
00331       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_scat)) deallocate                      &
00332      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_scat)
00333       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_capt)) deallocate                      &
00334      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_capt)
00335 
00336     end do
00337 
00338     ! deallocate isotopes
00339     if (allocated(this%isotopes)) deallocate(this%isotopes) 
00340 
00341     ! deallocate macro xs
00342     if (allocated(this%totalxs)) deallocate(this%totalxs)
00343     if (allocated(this%scattxs)) deallocate(this%scattxs)
00344     if (allocated(this%absorxs)) deallocate(this%absorxs)
00345 
00346   end subroutine deallocate_material
00347 
00348 end module materials
